product_details.description: About this itemPOWER UP YOUR PLAY - Win more games with Windows 11, a 13th Gen Intel Core i7-13650HX processor, and an NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4060 Laptop GPU at 140W Max TGP.BLAZING FAST MEMORY AND STORAGE ‚Äì Multitask swiftly with 16GB of DDR5-4800MHz memory and 1TB of PCIe Gen4 SSD.ROG INTELLIGENT COOLING ‚Äì The Strix G16 features Thermal Grizzly‚Äôs Conductonaut Extreme liquid metal on the CPU, and a third intake fan among other premium features, to allow for better sustained performance over long gaming sessions.SWIFT DISPLAY ‚Äì The Strix G16 features a FHD 165Hz panel, 100% sRGB, Pantone Validation, among other premium features on the Strix G16.XBOX GAME PASS ‚Äì Get a free 90-day pass and gain access to over 100 high-quality games. With games added all the time, there‚Äôs always something new to play‚Ä∫See more product details

reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 starsPerfect Balance of Power and Performance
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2025
reviews.text: Performance:The Intel Core i7-13650HX and NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4060 combo is a beast! Every game I've tested so far runs smoothly at high settings. The 16GB DDR5 RAM ensures multitasking is a breeze, whether I‚Äôm gaming, streaming, or working on video edits.Display:The 16-inch, 16:10 FHD display with a 165Hz refresh rate is a game-changer. The visuals are buttery smooth, vibrant, and crisp. It‚Äôs perfect for fast-paced games where every millisecond counts.Build and Design:The laptop feels premium and sturdy. The cooling system is excellent, keeping the machine cool even during intense gaming sessions. The RGB lighting on the keyboard adds a stylish touch.Value for Money:For its price, this laptop packs incredible features that cater to gamers and content creators alike. It‚Äôs future-proof and ready to handle even the most demanding tasks.Overall Experience:This is hands down one of the best gaming laptops I‚Äôve ever owned. ASUS nailed it with this model, providing top-notch performance, cutting-edge features, and excellent build quality. Highly recommended for anyone looking for a powerful, versatile machine. üëèIf you're considering this laptop, don‚Äôt hesitate‚Äîit‚Äôs worth every penny!Read more

reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 starsOutstanding
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2024
reviews.text: The ASUS ROG Strix G16 is an absolute powerhouse and a dream machine for gamers and creators alike.Equipped with top-tier hardware, this laptop handles everything I throw at it effortlessly. Gaming is buttery smooth even with maxed-out settings, and multitasking is seamless thanks to the powerful processor and ample RAM.The 16-inch screen with its high refresh rate is stunning. The colors are vibrant, the details are sharp, and the fluidity makes fast-paced games feel immersive and responsive.Sleek, modern, and undeniably ROG. The RGB keyboard is customizable and adds a premium feel, while the cooling system is highly effective and keeps the laptop running optimally even during long sessions.For a gaming laptop, the Strix G16 strikes a great balance between performance and portability. It‚Äôs lightweight enough to carry around without sacrificing the power you‚Äôd expect from a desktop replacement.While gaming laptops are known for short battery lives, the G16 pleasantly surprised me with its efficiency during non-gaming tasks.For the specs and performance this machine offers, it‚Äôs worth every penny. It‚Äôs an investment that will serve well for years to come.Whether you‚Äôre gaming, streaming, or editing, the ASUS ROG Strix G16 is a beast. Highly recommended to anyone looking for a reliable, high-performance laptop!Read more

reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 starsGreat laptop for more then gaming.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 14, 2025
reviews.text: It's a good laptop.My first time buying from ROG and I'd say it has been a good buy.The laptop runs everything I throw at it well. I stream edit and work from this computer.The battery is not great during gaming of course. But for mild tasks like note taking surfing the web etc. It does great and is plenty for me during my classes at college.It can get hot while gaming but I always have a little stand for it when I game.The fans and the system it advertises does alot better then I expected and overall is cooler then most laptops I see.Also it looks nice.Read more

reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 starsGood gaming laptop
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 14, 2025
reviews.text: This laptop has been good.  Good WiFi connectivity is good.  Have not had any problem with connectivity.  Since this is a gaming laptop the keyboard can have different colored lights.  The gaming keys, qwerasdf are reverse lighted, so if I am typing in the dark it is good but in light it can be difficult to see the keys.  Durability has been good.  I carry it in a padded computer bag.  It has a good weight so if you are looking for a light weight computer this would not be good.  Cooling is very good for a gaming laptop.  I can keep the laptop on my legs without it getting really hot.  Design and layout is good.  Monitor connection to based looks very good.  It has a regular Ethernet port not the collapsible type in thin laptops which I like.Read more

reviews.title: Excelente producto.
reviews.text: Vengo de una Asus TUF A15 Ryzen 7 con una RTX 3050/16GB de RAM. Esta Rog G16 i7 RTX4060/16 GB RAM la supera por bastante.La laptop me llego en perfectas condiciones, sin backlight bleeding ni problemas en la tarjeta grafica. Tampoco el famoso ‚Äúcoil whine‚Äù.La pantalla representa mucho mejor el color y da un poco m√°s brillo que una laptop gamer de gama baja. Bocinas decentes con cierto bass a mi parecer, unas dos rayitas m√°s de volumen y es perfecta.La sensaci√≥n del teclado y la construcci√≥n general de esta laptop es superior a lo com√∫n.Juegos AAA me los corre excelente. Entre 40fps(high/ultra) a 80fps(medium). En donde se vuelven notables los ventiladores pero tienen un sonido que a mi parecer es acostumbrable.En tareas b√°sicas en Adobe e internet es realmente silenciosa y no se calienta.En cuanto a programas de renderizado como referencia de una RTX3050 mobile me tardaban 15 seg por renders, Esta RTX4060 me tarda no m√°s de 6 seg. (Renderizo mobiliario urbano)En cuanto a la entrega tengo la teor√≠a que me la abri√≥ la aduana porque la caja ven√≠a con el sello cortado pero todo bien.Es un poco m√°s pesada que una laptop gamer b√°sica, me he adaptado bien, sin embargo es algo que notar√°s.Update: La laptop no ha presentado mayor problema. Sin embargo despu√©s de unos meses de transportandola ya me present√≥ backlight bleeding ligero. Lo considero normal dado el uso que le doy. Mi recomendaci√≥n es que la transporten con cuidado.Read more

reviews.title: Asus ROG STRIX G16
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United Arab Emirates on December 25, 2024
reviews.text: I purchased this laptop from this seller, and i am extremely satisfied. The device arrived promptly, well-packaged, and in perfect condition with the seal intact. I contacted the seller to confirm the product authenticity and they were very polite, kind, helpful, and attention to details. I would highly recommend this seller and would gladly shop with them again in the future .Read more
